name: Slime Designer Pro
description:
Slime Designer Pro is a short and sweet slime customization game we made for our Fall 2020 GDDV coding project!

Made by Madoomed.

Credits:

  • Cynthia Chang (Lead Programmer)
  • Lucas Nicolaides (Audio Manager, Documentation)
  • Merik Salvadore-Ally (Artist, Programmer)
  • Shaina Muli (Lead Artist, UI Designer)

Have fun creating your own slime! NOW, VOGUE!
